amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the Native Hawaiian Education program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 196 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for the Native Hawaiian Education program which provides funds to the Bishop Estate Trust which operates schools attended only by Native Hawaiaan children.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehner amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 202 - 220 (Roll no. 265).
